message: A silver-haired figure stands in the shadows. Clear?
...Wait. There's more than one.
Three, to be exact. Three almost identical figures. One has his back to me, and the other two are facing my direction.
For an instant, I'm sure I have to be hallucinating.
...Both of them have Clear's face. The only difference is their clothes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the...?"
The third figure turns at the sound of my voice.
...Another Clear.
When that Clear sees me, he runs to my side.

name: クリア
message: "Master!"
Clear? But those two also look like Clear...
The two in the back start to laugh.

name: クリアα
message: "Did you hear that? He just called him Master. That's his master."

name: クリア
message: "Master, I'm so sorry. I didn't mean to get you involved..."
The Clear standing next to me lowers his eyes apologetically.
This has to be the real Clear. There's something different about his expressions and mannerisms, plus he has two moles on his chin.
So what does that make the two smirking over there?

name: クリアα
message: "Hey. Snap out of it already."
One of the other two sighs, hand on his hip.

name: クリアα
message: "I told you. That's not your master. Toue is our master."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Toue?"
I tense up. I wasn't expecting to hear that name.
Clear frowns and glares at the copies of himself.

name: クリア
message: "No. I only have one master and this is him... Aoba."

name: クリアα
message: "Hah. He's broken."
The two Clears exchange a shrug, then turn to look at me.

name: クリアα
message: "We should probably bring him back for repairs... but there's something I want to try first."

name: クリアα
message: "Wouldn't it be faster if we dyed his little human?"

name: クリア
message: "No! I won't let you do that."

name: クリアα
message: "Oh shut your mouth."
One of them takes a step toward me.
He opens his mouth and takes a deep breath.

name: クリア
message: "Stop!"
But even as Clear shouts, the man begins to sing.
His voice is clear, almost terrifyingly so. It pierces me like a sharp blade, digging into my skull.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh, fuck, not this again...!"
It's just like what happened when I heard that song on TV!
A splitting pain in my skull drops me to my knees. The sound surrounds me, crashing in from all sides.
It's like being trapped on a boat in a storm.

name: クリア
message: "Master!"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"
I can't respond. I can only writhe in agony.

name: クリア
message: "Stop! Stop singing!"
The third Clear watches me, giggling.
Ren desperately tugs at my clothes, trying to keep me conscious...
But the song forces its way through my ears, making it impossible to think.
This must be Dye Music...

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba! Don't give in!"
I hear feet strike the ground, followed by a rush of air.
Clear darts through my blurry vision.
He knocks the singing Clear away, and the song stops.
What?!
Unless I'm seeing things, sparks just flew from Clear's arm!
